modal.code:
```go templ ModalConfirmDelete() {
for i := range 6 {
@components.Modal(fmt.Sprintf("modal_confirm_%d", i), modalConfirmDeleteButton(i, templ.Attributes{"onclick": fmt.Sprintf("modal_confirm_%d.showModal()", i)})) {

Are you sure you want to delete { fmt.Sprintf("%d", i) } ?

}
}
} templ modalConfirmDeleteButton(i int, attrs templ.Attributes) { } ```
